Class LocalResourceResolver

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.ial.mde.util.ResourceUtil
      gov.nasa.ial.mde.util.LocalResourceResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
URIResolver
public class LocalResourceResolver
extends ResourceUtil
implements URIResolver

This resolver will load the given URI from the class path, which the file could be in either a Jar file or in a directory.

1.0
